name: Dream Eater (Arcana4th)
description:
The Sleeping Cricket, a creature that feeds on nightmares, is sent by his friend, the psychiatrist Iris to infiltrate and end the nightmares of her patients. During the infiltration, he learns of a women in red that has been messing with the dreamers.

* Demo Includes only the two first battles

Controls:

Z -> Jump

X -> Shoot

Shift -> Run

Arrows -> Move
